subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kia Vaughn had 24 points and Cappie Pondexter added 23 points and 10 assists to help the Liberty snap a four-game losing streak with a 94-82 victory in Tulsa.
snippet: Kia Vaughn had 24 points and Cappie Pondexter added 23 points and 10 assists to help the Liberty snap a four-game losing streak with a 94-82 victory in Tulsa.
